mapper.insert: insert into photos (name, status, path, attribute, description) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update photos set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute = #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, status, path, attribute, description from photos
